RMIT POSTGRADUATE SOCIAL NETWORKING EVENT  

Networking is a crucial part of the postgrad experience at RMIT. We offer our students exclusive opportunities to connect with other students, lecturers and industry.  

Recently, a POSTGRADUATE SOCIAL NETWORKING EVENT was held where MBA and MIB students of different cohorts met with our faculty and industry guests from Robert Walters, one of the leading headhunting agencies. In his brief presentation, Mr. Phuc Pham, Country Manager from Robert Walters, shared ‚ÄúHiring Outlook For 2023 and The Skills You Should Work On,‚Äù which triggered exciting discussion about the employment opportunities for the year ahead.  

After the presentation, Vinh Nguyen, an MBA student who has just finished his final semester, gave a small talk on how to network within a master‚Äôs class and ran a ‚Äòspeed-dating' activity, where attendees had the chance to enrich their circle of acquaintances and gain a few new connections.  

_ 

Would you like to join our close-knit and supportive community? Check out the links below to discover how a postgraduate program at RMIT can change your life:

üî∏ Master of Cyber Security: https://bit.ly/3ijYXwy
